attributes.action: Say yes to providing a service for raf valley,Anglesey
attributes.additional_details:
Anglesey county council refuse to provide a full service for Ex,M.o.d properties in R.A.F Valley,that were sold to the public in 1999 charging the full rate of a band B council tax per year for each household,costing areas in raf ,£86 a month for clearence of  there bins and recycling waste only!!!
The  council do not Maintain the roads,public paths,street lamp maintanence,grass maintain ,bus shelters and other services the council are suppose to provide!
We pay a private company to maintain what the council refuse to provide but charge the full amount.
This pertition is to get anglesey county council to adopt raf valley Anglesey and provide us with a full service
OR
Council tax to be reduced and charge the residents of raf valley for clearance of bins,recycling good,community and police only.
